mapper.sql: x_id, x_number, x_buliding, x_mj, x_xuliding, x_unitNumber, x_Nuberj, x_hoursNumber, x_remarks
mapper.select: SELECT xq.x_number,xq.x_buliding,b.b_buliding,b.b_number ,dy.h_number dyid ,dy.h_bulidingName dym,s.h_bulidingName fjmh,s.h_number fjbh FROM xiaoqu xq LEFT JOIN buliding b ON xq.x_number = b.x_number LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM houses WHERE h_unitNumber IS NOT NULL) dy ON b.b_number = dy.b_number LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM houses WHERE h_unitNumber IS NULL) s ON dy.h_number=s.b_number
mapper.insert:
insert into xiaoqu
x_id,
x_number,
x_buliding,
x_mj,
x_xuliding,
x_unitNumber,
x_Nuberj,
x_hoursNumber,
x_remarks,
#{xId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xBuliding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xMj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xXuliding,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xUnitnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xNuberj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xHoursnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update xiaoqu
x_number = #{xNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
x_buliding = #{xBuliding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
x_mj = #{xMj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
x_xuliding = #{xXuliding,jdbcType=INTEGER},
x_unitNumber = #{xUnitnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
x_Nuberj = #{xNuberj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
x_hoursNumber = #{xHoursnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
x_remarks = #{xRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where x_id = #{xId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xiaoqu set x_number = #{xNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_buliding = #{xBuliding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_mj = #{xMj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, x_xuliding = #{xXuliding,jdbcType=INTEGER}, x_unitNumber = #{xUnitnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, x_Nuberj = #{xNuberj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, x_hoursNumber = #{xHoursnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, x_remarks = #{xRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where x_id = #{xId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
